prompt: Criar um programa que distribui espadas a cada 15 segundos para personagens no jogo.

script.description: Server-side Script for handling server logic, e.g., spawning a collectible item

Source.value:
while true do
	local item = Instance.new('Part')
	item.Name = 'SpawnedItem'
	item.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
	item.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-50, 50), 5, math.random(-50, 50))
	item.Anchored = false
	item.Parent = workspace
	wait(5)
end
Source.description: Lua code to spawn items randomly in the workspace every 5 seconds

creationLocation.description: Location where the script is created
creationLocation.descriptionDetails: Server scripts are typically placed in ServerScriptService for server-side execution

fileType.descriptionDetails: Server-side Lua script for game logic

localScript.description: Client-side LocalScript for handling player-specific actions, e.g., camera effects

Source.value:
local camera = workspace.CurrentCamera
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
player.Chatted:Connect(function(msg)
	if msg == '/shake' then
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Scriptable
		for i = 1, 10 do
			camera.CFrame = camera.CFrame * CFrame.new(math.random(-0.5, 0.5), math.random(-0.5, 0.5), 0)
			wait(0.1)
		end
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom
	end
end)
Source.description: Lua code to shake the camera when the player types '/shake' in chat

moduleScript.description: ModuleScript for reusable code, e.g., a utility to manage player stats

Source.value:
local Stats = {}
Stats.__index = Stats
function Stats.new()
	local self = setmetatable({}, Stats)
	self.Health = 100
	self.Score = 0
	return self
end
function Stats:AddScore(points)
	self.Score = self.Score + points
	return self.Score
end
return Stats
Source.description: Lua code defining a module to manage player health and score

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

prompt: Criar um programa que fornece itens a cada 15 segundos para personagens no mundo.

script.description: Server-side Script for handling server logic, e.g., spawning a collectible item

Source.value:
while true do
	local item = Instance.new('Part')
	item.Name = 'SpawnedItem'
	item.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
	item.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-50, 50), 5, math.random(-50, 50))
	item.Anchored = false
	item.Parent = workspace
	wait(5)
end
Source.description: Lua code to spawn items randomly in the workspace every 5 seconds

creationLocation.descriptionDetails: Server scripts are typically placed in ServerScriptService for server-side execution

Source.value:
local camera = workspace.CurrentCamera
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
player.Chatted:Connect(function(msg)
	if msg == '/shake' then
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Scriptable
		for i = 1, 10 do
			camera.CFrame = camera.CFrame * CFrame.new(math.random(-0.5, 0.5), math.random(-0.5, 0.5), 0)
			wait(0.1)
		end
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom
	end
end)

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

metadata.description: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos no mundo.

script.description: Server-side Script for handling server logic, e.g., spawning a collectible item

Source.value:
while true do
	local item = Instance.new('Part')
	item.Name = 'SpawnedItem'
	item.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
	item.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-50, 50), 5, math.random(-50, 50))
	item.Anchored = false
	item.Parent = workspace
	wait(5)
end

Source.value:
local camera = workspace.CurrentCamera
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
player.Chatted:Connect(function(msg)
	if msg == '/shake' then
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Scriptable
		for i = 1, 10 do
			camera.CFrame = camera.CFrame * CFrame.new(math.random(-0.5, 0.5), math.random(-0.5, 0.5), 0)
			wait(0.1)
		end
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom
	end
end)

moduleScript.description: ModuleScript for reusable code, e.g., a utility to manage player stats

Source.value:
local Stats = {}
Stats.__index = Stats
function Stats.new()
	local self = setmetatable({}, Stats)
	self.Health = 100
	self.Score = 0
	return self
end
function Stats:AddScore(points)
	self.Score = self.Score + points
	return self.Score
end
return Stats

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

metadata.description: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos no mundo.

prompt: Quero um código simples que distribui espadas para players sem loop.

script.description: Server-side Script for handling server logic, e.g., spawning a collectible item

while true do
	local item = Instance.new('Part')
	item.Name = 'SpawnedItem'
	item.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
	item.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-50, 50), 5, math.random(-50, 50))
	item.Anchored = false
	item.Parent = workspace
	wait(5)
end
Source.description: Lua code to spawn items randomly in the workspace every 5 seconds

creationLocation.descriptionDetails: Server scripts are typically placed in ServerScriptService for server-side execution

Source.value:
local camera = workspace.CurrentCamera
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
player.Chatted:Connect(function(msg)
	if msg == '/shake' then
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Scriptable
		for i = 1, 10 do
			camera.CFrame = camera.CFrame * CFrame.new(math.random(-0.5, 0.5), math.random(-0.5, 0.5), 0)
			wait(0.1)
		end
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom
	end
end)

local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

metadata.description: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos no mundo.

prompt: Fazer um código para Roblox que entrega itens a cada quinze segundos para personagens em jogadores.

script.description: Server-side Script for handling server logic, e.g., spawning a collectible item

Source.value:
while true do
	local item = Instance.new('Part')
	item.Name = 'SpawnedItem'
	item.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
	item.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-50, 50), 5, math.random(-50, 50))
	item.Anchored = false
	item.Parent = workspace
	wait(5)
end
Source.description: Lua code to spawn items randomly in the workspace every 5 seconds

creationLocation.description: Location where the script is created
creationLocation.descriptionDetails: Server scripts are typically placed in ServerScriptService for server-side execution

localScript.description: Client-side LocalScript for handling player-specific actions, e.g., camera effects

Source.value:
local camera = workspace.CurrentCamera
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
player.Chatted:Connect(function(msg)
	if msg == '/shake' then
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Scriptable
		for i = 1, 10 do
			camera.CFrame = camera.CFrame * CFrame.new(math.random(-0.5, 0.5), math.random(-0.5, 0.5), 0)
			wait(0.1)
		end
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom
	end
end)

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = "Sword"
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new({'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0})
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = 10
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = "Sword"
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new({'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0})
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = 10
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

			camera.CFrame = camera.CFrame * CFrame.new(math.random(-0.5, 0.5), math.random(-0.5, 0.5), 0)

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

	item.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-50, 50), 5, math.random(-50, 50))
	item.Anchored = false
	item.Parent = workspace
	wait(5)
end

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

	item.Anchored = false
	item.Parent = workspace
	wait(5)

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

	item.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-50, 50), 5, math.random(-50, 50))
	item.Anchored = false
	item.Parent = workspace
	wait(5)
end

			camera.CFrame = camera.CFrame * CFrame.new(math.random(-0.5, 0.5), math.random(-0.5, 0.5), 0)
			wait(0.1)

script.description: Server-side Script for handling server logic, e.g., spawning a collectible item

Source.value:
while true do
	local item = Instance.new('Part')
	item.Name = 'SpawnedItem'
	item.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
	item.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-50, 50), 5, math.random(-50, 50))
	item.Anchored = false
	item.Parent = workspace
	wait(5)
end
Source.description: Lua code to spawn items randomly in the workspace every 5 seconds

creationLocation.description: Location where the script is created
creationLocation.descriptionDetails: Server scripts are typically placed in ServerScriptService for server-side execution

fileType.descriptionDetails: Server-side Lua script for game logic

localScript.description: Client-side LocalScript for handling player-specific actions, e.g., camera effects

Source.value:
local camera = workspace.CurrentCamera
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
player.Chatted:Connect(function(msg)
	if msg == '/shake' then
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Scriptable
		for i = 1, 10 do
			camera.CFrame = camera.CFrame * CFrame.new(math.random(-0.5, 0.5), math.random(-0.5, 0.5), 0)
			wait(0.1)
		end
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom
	end
end)
Source.description: Lua code to shake the camera when the player types '/shake' in chat

creationLocation.description: Location where the local script is created
creationLocation.descriptionDetails: Local scripts are typically placed in PlayerGui for client-side execution

fileType.descriptionDetails: Client-side Lua script for player-specific functionality

moduleScript.description: ModuleScript for reusable code, e.g., a utility to manage player stats

Source.value:
local Stats = {}
Stats.__index = Stats
function Stats.new()
	local self = setmetatable({}, Stats)
	self.Health = 100
	self.Score = 0
	return self
end
function Stats:AddScore(points)
	self.Score = self.Score + points
	return self.Score
end
return Stats
Source.description: Lua code defining a module to manage player health and score

creationLocation.descriptionDetails: Module scripts are typically placed in ReplicatedStorage for shared access

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

	item.Parent = workspace

end

		for i = 1, 10 do
			camera.CFrame = camera.CFrame * CFrame.new(math.random(-0.5, 0.5), math.random(-0.5, 0.5), 0)

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

script.description: Server-side Script for handling server logic, e.g., spawning a collectible item

while true do
	local item = Instance.new('Part')
	item.Name = 'SpawnedItem'
	item.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
	item.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-50, 50), 5, math.random(-50, 50))
	item.Anchored = false
	item.Parent = workspace
	wait(5)
end
Source.description: Lua code to spawn items randomly in the workspace every 5 seconds

creationLocation.descriptionDetails: Server scripts are typically placed in ServerScriptService for server-side execution

Source.value:
local camera = workspace.CurrentCamera
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
player.Chatted:Connect(function(msg)
	if msg == '/shake' then
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Scriptable
		for i = 1, 10 do
			camera.CFrame = camera.CFrame * CFrame.new(math.random(-0.5, 0.5), math.random(-0.5, 0.5), 0)
			wait(0.1)
		end
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom
	end
end)

	return self.Score
end
return Stats

--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

prompt: Gerar um sistema que dá espadas a cada 15 segundos para jogadores no mapa.

script.description: Server-side Script for handling server logic, e.g., spawning a collectible item

while true do
	local item = Instance.new('Part')
	item.Name = 'SpawnedItem'
	item.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
	item.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-50, 50), 5, math.random(-50, 50))
	item.Anchored = false
	item.Parent = workspace
	wait(5)
end
Source.description: Lua code to spawn items randomly in the workspace every 5 seconds

Source.value:
local camera = workspace.CurrentCamera
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
player.Chatted:Connect(function(msg)
	if msg == '/shake' then
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Scriptable
		for i = 1, 10 do
			camera.CFrame = camera.CFrame * CFrame.new(math.random(-0.5, 0.5), math.random(-0.5, 0.5), 0)
			wait(0.1)
		end
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom
	end
end)

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

Stats.__index = Stats
function Stats.new()
	local self = setmetatable({}, Stats)
	self.Health = 100
	self.Score = 0
	return self
end
function Stats:AddScore(points)
	self.Score = self.Score + points
	return self.Score
end
return Stats

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = "Sword"
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new({'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0})
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = 10
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

script.description: Server-side Script for handling server logic, e.g., spawning a collectible item

Source.value:
while true do
	local item = Instance.new('Part')
	item.Name = 'SpawnedItem'
	item.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
	item.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-50, 50), 5, math.random(-50, 50))
	item.Anchored = false
	item.Parent = workspace
	wait(5)
end
Source.description: Lua code to spawn items randomly in the workspace every 5 seconds

creationLocation.description: Location where the script is created
creationLocation.descriptionDetails: Server scripts are typically placed in ServerScriptService for server-side execution

fileType.descriptionDetails: Server-side Lua script for game logic

localScript.description: Client-side LocalScript for handling player-specific actions, e.g., camera effects

Source.value:
local camera = workspace.CurrentCamera
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
player.Chatted:Connect(function(msg)
	if msg == '/shake' then
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Scriptable
		for i = 1, 10 do
			camera.CFrame = camera.CFrame * CFrame.new(math.random(-0.5, 0.5), math.random(-0.5, 0.5), 0)
			wait(0.1)
		end
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom
	end
end)
Source.description: Lua code to shake the camera when the player types '/shake' in chat

creationLocation.description: Location where the local script is created
creationLocation.descriptionDetails: Local scripts are typically placed in PlayerGui for client-side execution

fileType.descriptionDetails: Client-side Lua script for player-specific functionality

moduleScript.description: ModuleScript for reusable code, e.g., a utility to manage player stats

Source.value:
local Stats = {}
Stats.__index = Stats
function Stats.new()
	local self = setmetatable({}, Stats)
	self.Health = 100
	self.Score = 0
	return self
end
function Stats:AddScore(points)
	self.Score = self.Score + points
	return self.Score
end
return Stats
Source.description: Lua code defining a module to manage player health and score

creationLocation.description: Location where the module script is created
creationLocation.descriptionDetails: Module scripts are typically placed in ReplicatedStorage for shared access

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

Stats.__index = Stats
function Stats.new()
	local self = setmetatable({}, Stats)
	self.Health = 100
	self.Score = 0
	return self
end
function Stats:AddScore(points)
	self.Score = self.Score + points
	return self.Score
end
return Stats
Source.description: Lua code defining a module to manage player health and score

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = "Sword"
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new({'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0})
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = 10
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

while true do

	item.Name = 'SpawnedItem'
	item.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
	item.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-50, 50), 5, math.random(-50, 50))
	item.Anchored = false
	item.Parent = workspace
	wait(5)
end

Source.value:
local camera = workspace.CurrentCamera
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
player.Chatted:Connect(function(msg)
	if msg == '/shake' then
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Scriptable
		for i = 1, 10 do
			camera.CFrame = camera.CFrame * CFrame.new(math.random(-0.5, 0.5), math.random(-0.5, 0.5), 0)
			wait(0.1)
		end
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom
	end
end)

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

	item.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-50, 50), 5, math.random(-50, 50))
	item.Anchored = false
	item.Parent = workspace
	wait(5)
end

script.description: Server-side Script for handling server logic, e.g., spawning a collectible item

Source.value:
while true do
	local item = Instance.new('Part')
	item.Name = 'SpawnedItem'
	item.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
	item.Position = Vector3.new(math.random(-50, 50), 5, math.random(-50, 50))
	item.Anchored = false
	item.Parent = workspace
	wait(5)
end
Source.description: Lua code to spawn items randomly in the workspace every 5 seconds

creationLocation.description: Location where the script is created
creationLocation.descriptionDetails: Server scripts are typically placed in ServerScriptService for server-side execution

fileType.descriptionDetails: Server-side Lua script for game logic

localScript.description: Client-side LocalScript for handling player-specific actions, e.g., camera effects

Source.value:
local camera = workspace.CurrentCamera
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
player.Chatted:Connect(function(msg)
	if msg == '/shake' then
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Scriptable
		for i = 1, 10 do
			camera.CFrame = camera.CFrame * CFrame.new(math.random(-0.5, 0.5), math.random(-0.5, 0.5), 0)
			wait(0.1)
		end
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom
	end
end)
Source.description: Lua code to shake the camera when the player types '/shake' in chat

creationLocation.description: Location where the local script is created
creationLocation.descriptionDetails: Local scripts are typically placed in PlayerGui for client-side execution

fileType.descriptionDetails: Client-side Lua script for player-specific functionality

moduleScript.description: ModuleScript for reusable code, e.g., a utility to manage player stats

Source.value:
local Stats = {}
Stats.__index = Stats
function Stats.new()
	local self = setmetatable({}, Stats)
	self.Health = 100
	self.Score = 0
	return self
end
function Stats:AddScore(points)
	self.Score = self.Score + points
	return self.Score
end
return Stats
Source.description: Lua code defining a module to manage player health and score

creationLocation.description: Location where the module script is created
creationLocation.descriptionDetails: Module scripts are typically placed in ReplicatedStorage for shared access

fileType.descriptionDetails: Reusable Lua module for shared game logic

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

	if msg == '/shake' then
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Scriptable
		for i = 1, 10 do
			camera.CFrame = camera.CFrame * CFrame.new(math.random(-0.5, 0.5), math.random(-0.5, 0.5), 0)
			wait(0.1)
		end
		camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom
	end
end)

local Stats = {}
Stats.__index = Stats
function Stats.new()
	local self = setmetatable({}, Stats)
	self.Health = 100
	self.Score = 0
	return self
end
function Stats:AddScore(points)
	self.Score = self.Score + points
	return self.Score
end
return Stats

generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: GiveItem
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Configurações de entrega de itens
local GIVE_INTERVAL = 15 -- segundos
local ITEM_NAME = "Sword"
local ITEM_DAMAGE = 10
local ITEM_COLOR = {'r': 1, 'g': 0, 'b': 0}

-- Função que dá um item a um jogador
local function giveItem(player)
    if player.Character then
        local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
        tool.Name = ITEM_NAME
        local handle = Instance.new("Part")
        handle.Name = "Handle"
        handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(ITEM_COLOR)
        handle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 4)
        handle.Parent = tool
        local script = Instance.new("Script")
        script.Name = "DamageScript"
        script.Source = [[
            local tool = script.Parent
            local damage = ITEM_DAMAGE
            tool.Activated:Connect(function()
                local humanoid = tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass('Humanoid')
                if humanoid then
                    humanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
                end
            end)
        ]]
        script.Parent = tool
        tool.Parent = player.Backpack
    end
end

-- Loop principal para dar itens a todos os jogadores
while true do
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        giveItem(player)
    end
    wait(GIVE_INTERVAL)
end

metadata.description: Dá um item (ferramenta) a todos os jogadores a cada X segundos no mundo.
